item.title: A Picture is Worth 170 Tokens: How Does GPT-4o Encode Images?
item.description: Here’s a fact: GPT-4o charges 170 tokens to process each 512x512 tile used in high-res mode. (They also charge 85 tokens for the low-res master thumbnail, but let’s focus on the 512x512 tiles to start with.) At 0.75 tokens/word, this suggests a picture is worth about 227 words - only a factor of four off from the traditional saying. OK, but why 170? It’s an oddly specific number, isn’t it?
